project_abstract.cdata: The Second Henan Provincial Highway Project has the following objectives: 1) to support continuing development of road infrastructure to relieve congestion, facilitate mobility and increase the efficiency of road transport in the interest of stimulating economic activity; 2) to assist in the implementation of policies to alleviate poverty in the poor areas of the province; 3) to promote development of institutional capabilities of Henan Provincial Communications Department (HPCD), through training and other means, in planning, design, operations and maintenance of Henan's highway network; and 4) to increase the safety of road transport. The project's components include the following: 1) construction of the Luoyang-Sanmenxia Expressway (LSE), which will include supply and installation of electrical, electronic and mechanical equipment for toll collection, telecommunications and lighting facilities, as well as construction of service areas and management and maintenance buildings; 2) construction of the Yangjia-Baijiazhai Connection (YBC) to link the Weinan-Tongguan Expressway (WTE) in Shaanxi Province with the existing Highway 310 in Henan Province; 3) construction, rehabilitation and upgrading of four linking roads that will interconnect and feed traffic to the LSE at interchanges; 4) improvement and new construction of rural roads in a program to alleviate poverty (RIPA) in poor counties in Henan; 5) construction supervision of the LSE, the linking roads and RIPA; 6) provision of equipment; 7) institutional strengthening and training; and 8) a highway safety component to help reduce accidents on Henan's highways.

P040513.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第二河南公路项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是：（1）支持建设道路基础设施，缓解交通拥堵，为人员货物流动提供便利，提高公路运输效率，进而刺激经济活动；（2）协助在河南省贫困地区实施扶贫政策；（3）通过河南省公路网规划、设计、运行养护方面的培训和其它措施，促进提升河南省交通厅的机构能力；（4） 提升道路交通安全水平。本项目设有以下子项目：（1）洛阳至三门峡高速公路（洛三高速公路）建设子项目，其内容包括供应并安装收费站机电和电子设备、通信设备和照明设施、建设服务区以及管理和养护建筑；（2）杨家至白家寨连接道建设子项目，其目的是连通陕西省境内渭南至潼关高速公路和310国道河南段；（3）四条连接道建设、恢复及升级改造子项目。这四条道路将通过立交桥与洛三高速公路连通，并向其输送车辆；（4）农村公路改造和建设子项目，这是河南省贫困县扶贫工程的一项内容；（5）洛三高速公路、连接道和农村公路施工监理子项目；（6）设备提供子项目；（7）机构加强和培训子项目；（8）公路安全子项目，其目的是帮助减少河南省公路交通事故。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
